title: Interpretation of a dream about not preparing for exams

preview.html: The dream is also interpreted with surprising things to the dreamer that he did not take into consideration in his life, and from the translator of this website we will talk and present in detail the vision of examination in a dream in detail. The interpretation of seeing a dream that you are not ready for exams for a single girl. Likewise, if an unmarried woman dreams that she is not prepared for exams and feels nervous. It appears that she She will suffer a lot of damage in her life during this period of time. Likewise, an unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she did not prepare for the exam and did not solve it is an indication that she is confused in her life and did not prepare for the issues that she faces or is exposed to. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream She is taking surprise exams and was not prepared for it. It is an indication that something sudden will happen in her life that she had not thought about, and God knows best. The unmarried woman saw that she saw the exam in a dream, and she did not prepare for it, and she felt very sorry. A clear explanation for why she is not thinking about things now in her life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about cheating in exams for single women. Interpretation of not preparing for exams in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is taking an exam and has not prepared for it. An indication that she is suffering a lot in her life at this time from the sad things she sees. Likewise, seeing a married woman see The exam is in a dream and she is afraid of the solution. It indicates that she sees many responsibilities in her life and she suffers a lot from them, and God knows best. A married woman dreams that her husband is forcing her to take an exam. Here is evidence of an important matter that her husband will force her to do and she needs a lot of time to think about it. Thus, a married woman who sees in a dream that her husband is looking at her and she has not prepared for exams. It explains the many difficulties that she will encounter with her husband during this period of her life. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman not preparing for exams in a dream. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she has not prepared for exams in a dream and she is sad. An indication of the evils that she will be exposed to and will see in this period of her life. If she looks at the exam and cannot solve it in a dream, she feels stressed. It indicates that she is involved in many big problems, and is trying to solve them and get rid of them in her life. And if the divorced woman is forced to enter The exam and she did not prepare for it in the dream. This is a sign that she will be exposed to a big and very sad situation in her life that will affect her. The divorced woman who saw in the dream that she did not prepare for the exams in the dream. This is a sign that she will suffer a lot in this period of her life, and she will not get rid of it easily. Read Also: Interpretation of a dream about delaying exams for singles. Interpretation of seeing a man not preparing for exams in a dream. About the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is preparing for an exam but does not prepare for it in the dream. An indication of the great pain that a person will experience in his life. The dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at the exam and does not prepare for it in the dream. He is preparing for it in a dream. It is an indication of a great tiring situation that he will experience in his life and he will not get rid of it easily. And seeing the dreamer watching the exam in a dream, and he was not touched.

title: The meaning of seeing a male child being hugged in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Seeing a male child being embraced in a dream by an unmarried womanDreams are the biggest occupation for many people, especially women, as they search for a reason for every dream. Seeing a male child being embraced in a dream by an unmarried womanTo search for an interpretation of this dream. Seeing in a dream embracing a male childMany interpreters agree across History states that seeing a child in a dream can be a good or bad omen. Seeing a male child in a dream for an unmarried womanWe will meet through the siteVariousThere are many such interpretations. Some interpreters say that a woman who sees a male child in a dream means that she will face many problems and difficulties In her life. If a woman sees in her dream that there is a very beautiful child and she admires him, this means that she will hear some good and joyful news in her life. When a woman dreams that her newborn or child has died, this means that she will face many problems or a serious illness and her life will be miserable Extremely. If a married woman sees that she is a mother beating her child, this is an interpretation that there will be many problems and disagreements between her and her husband. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream about the senior imams. Interpretation of seeing a male child being embraced in a dream for a single woman. It may be the dreams of an unmarried girl. Annoying to some. When an unmarried girl sees any dream, it worries her, and among these dreams is her childhood dream, so she is looking for an interpretation. Seeing a male child in a dream for an unmarried woman is also there. There are many things and interpretations about the dreams of a married woman or an unmarried girl who has a male child. The interpreters say Immediately, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there is a handsome little boy smiling at her, this means that her life will be beautiful and comfortable and she will get rid of the sadness she is experiencing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is carrying a child in her arms, this means that she will face many problems. She will endure many fears and get sick. But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that there is a deformed male child, this means that she will be exposed to many problems, losses, worries, and grief, and she will incur many financial losses. If the woman was previously married and is now divorced, and she sees a small child in a dream This means that she will marry again and live a new life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about gold for married women, single women, and pregnant women. A male embrace in a dream for a pregnant woman. Mostly, a pregnant woman dreams many dreams, due to stress and changes in her hormones, so she searches for an interpretation of these different dreams, and one of them is: These dreams are a dream of seeing a male child. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that there is a beautiful male child, this means that she will give birth to a female child, which is the opposite of what she saw. When a woman dreams of an ugly male child that she does not love and is moving away from, this means that she will face many problems. And difficulties in her life. If a pregnant woman sees that there is a very beautiful child, this indicates the good psychological state that she and her child are in. Seeing a child in

title: Interpretation of the dream of building a mosque in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a mosque and building it in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married or an unmarried man, whether he enters the mosque and prays, cleans, washes, wipes, according to Ibn Sirino al-Nabulsi, and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic below. Building a mosque in a dream is from Beautiful dreams that bring us a lot of goodness and happiness in public life, and it shows that the dreamer is close to God Almighty. The mosque is one of the very good things in public places. The life that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, recommended by working in building the mosque. - Remember God Almighty in it and pray to Him. Building mosques in dreams is evidence of the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will receive. Interpretation of building a mosque in a dream: Seeing a man building a mosque in a dream is evidence that he is a man who always obeys God Almighty. Also, seeing building a mosque in a dream indicates that The dreamer is a person dedicated to the Sunnah of the Holy Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. Building a mosque in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s closeness to God, and the dreamer will find the appropriate solution to all the problems and obstacles he faces in the dream. Seeing building a mosque in a dream is evidence of achieving many goals in public life and gaining... Ambitions. Seeing a man building a mosque in a dream also indicates an overwhelming victory over enemies. Seeing a mosque in a single person’s dream is evidence of major changes in life, attachment and marriage to a good person with good morals. Demolishing a mosque in a dream is evidence of the imminent death of a prominent and famous scholar in life. Public. Seeing the dreamer building a mosque in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is practicing justice in public life. The dreamer supervising the construction of a mosque for a wealthy person who has a high status in the dream is evidence that the owner of the mosque has good morals and is fair among people. A married man who builds a mosque in a dream Evidence that he will give birth to a son in the near future and he will be righteous. Seeing an unmarried man building a mosque in a dream is evidence of marrying a woman with good morals. If a rich man sees in a dream that he is building a mosque, it is evidence of paying zakat from his wealth in full. Seeing the poor building a mosque In a dream, it is evidence of obtaining abundant livelihood and great changes in the near future. Building a mosque in a dream for a woman and a man is evidence of the dreamer’s full interest in all religious teachings. Building mosques in a dream also indicates that you are getting closer to God and avoiding sins. Building the dreamer’s mosque in The dream is evidence of the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will receive in the near future. The presence of wrong things in the construction of the mosque in the dream is evidence of problems and obstacles that happen to the dreamer. Interpretation of the mosque in a dream: The mosque in a dream is a man of knowledge. Whoever sees that he is building a mosque, this indicates goodness, Sunnah, kinship, and taking over the judiciary if he is qualified to do so. Whoever sees a complete mosque is a man who brings people together and reconciles with them with justice and goodness. If he saw a mosque being demolished, the ruler of the world, the man of religion and asceticism, would die in it. But if he sees an unknown person praying in the mosque and the imam of the mosque is passing by

title: The 9 best interpretations of seeing a table in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a table in a dream? Elements for fulfilling dreams and desires. What does it mean to see a wooden table? Proof of safety and security. What is the interpretation of seeing a golden table? Indication of good luck that God will obtain. What does it mean to see sitting at a table with children? Evidence On joy and happiness. What is the interpretation of seeing a table in one dream? Evidence of success in work and studies. Interpretation of a dream about a table by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a table in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of dreams and desires. A table on which there is a feast is a sign of joy and happy news. After that, seeing a table indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires. An empty table indicates loss and deprivation. Seeing a table made of wood is a sign of safety and security. A dining room attended by guests is a sign of kindness and prosperity. After that, seeing a table full of food indicates bliss and prosperity. A table in a dream shows enjoyment of the world and goodness. A made table of gold is an indication of the good luck that the god will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi’s table: If one sees in a dream that he is distributing food to the people sitting at the table, this is evidence of a job and a prestigious position that the dreamer will obtain. So, seeing that food is prepared on the table in quantities Big is a sign of goodness and prosperity in life. Seeing yourself sitting at a table with children is a sign of joy and happiness. If one dreams that he is sitting at a table with pets, this indicates that he is in need of affection. Then seeing the wife and husband sitting at the dining table Evidence of harmony between spouses and the stability of life between them. Then, seeing your friends sitting at the table is a sign that you are traveling to earn money. Showing a singles’ table. The table in one’s dream is evidence of happy news. Then, seeing a table full of food in an unmarried woman’s dream, is An indication of marriage soon. The table is evidence of generosity and wealth for a free man. The board is a travel guide for individuals. The table in one dream is evidence of success in work and study. So, seeing a dining table in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her engagement in the near future. Interpretation of a dream A married woman’s table: Seeing a table full of food is evidence of marital happiness. Seeing a table full of sour and spoiled food is an indication of a bad marital relationship between her and her husband. So, seeing only men at the table is a symbol of worries and problems. Meeting children and women at the table is considered a sign To get rid of problems and remove worries. Interpretation of a dream about a table for a pregnant woman: Seeing a white table in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the birth of a woman. Hence, seeing a table full of food in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of birth. A table full of food of many delicious varieties Evidence of affordable childbirth.

title: A falling fang in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, we will explain from our website in the following lines the interpretation of this dream, taking into account the variation of the dreamer’s person and psychological state. Interpretation of seeing a fang falling out in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of seeing a fang falling out in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the blessing that she will enjoy in life. While the single girl was watching her teeth falling out , you did not feel any pain. It is a sign that the relationship you have with someone has ended without you feeling sad about it. If a girl sees that a tusk falls out in her dream, this is a sign that she will fall into a difficult situation that will disturb her life. As well as the falling of the tusk In a dream for an unmarried girl. An expression of what you will experience with your future husband in the coming days of happiness and stability. Seeing a dog falling to the ground in a dream is an expression of the loss of one of her relatives. The falling of an upper molar in an unmarried girl’s dream. An indication of the sadness she feels as a result of the end of The relationship between her and the person she intends to date. If she sees that her upper molar has fallen out in her dream, this is a harbinger of the end of a period in her life full of difficulties. Seeing the lower molar falling out in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a health crisis or a family crisis that someone around her is suffering from. When an unmarried woman sees that the upper tusk falls out without pain. This is a sign that she will receive good luck and abundance of sustenance. It is interpreted to see a tusk falling out in a dream for an unmarried girl, without feeling remorse or remorse. Good news that God will protect her from everyone who wants to It hurts her. See also: The lower molar falling out in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a canine falling out in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a canine falling out in a dream for a married woman indicates pregnancy soon. Seeing this canine falling out in her dream. It is evidence of her permanent connection to the future of her children and her concern for them. She may see the canine falling out In a married woman’s dream, warning her of the financial hardship she is exposed to, and she must pray and look for reasons to overcome it. Seeing the upper tusk falling out in a married woman’s dream indicates a lot of sustenance and abundant goodness that prevails in her life. Also, seeing the tusk falling out in her dream is an expression of The tragedy that she is experiencing and which she suffers from a lot. Seeing her husband’s teeth falling out in a dream. This indicates marital strife between her and him, and she must be patient to overcome it. Seeing a canine tooth falling out in a married woman’s dream. It shows what is going on in her subconscious mind about the past. She may see the lower molar falling out. In the dream of a married woman. An indication of a difficult situation facing her husband or the end of their relationship. The interpretation of seeing a fang falling out in a dream for a divorced woman. The interpretation of seeing a fang falling out in a dream for a divorced woman is the highest. It is a sign of abundance in livelihood. Seeing her lower fang falling out in a dream means buried sadness. Within her. While the upper left canine falling in her dream heralds the end of the suffering she is experiencing. Seeing the divorced woman in her dream that her teeth are shining white. It promises her good news that stability will return to her life again. When she sees the upper left canine falling. This expresses things The bad that you are going through

title: Interpretations of seeing coins in a dream

preview.html: If a pregnant woman sees that she is carrying a bag of coins inside her, then the newborn will be a boy, God willing. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of coins Ibn Sirin usually shows that coins are good, a blessing and a livelihood, and the more they are in a dream, the more good is expected. As for the one who sees in his dream that someone gives him money and the sleeper takes it, the dream is good, food, blessing and happiness for the sleeper, and God knows best. As for the one who dreams that he is giving some coins to someone he knows, the dream indicates that you are a person who is always looking for trouble. As for the one who asks in a dream for some coins from one of his acquaintances, the dream means that the sleeper is asking for his right that he cannot get. The meaning of coins in a dream As for the one who dreams of multiplying coins with him, especially five times, this means a blessing whether in the monthly salary or in trade if the sleeper is a merchant, or benefit and success if the sleeper is a student. As for the one who sees that someone gives him a bag of coins in a dream and he does not know him, then someone will give the sleeper secrets that he wants to hide from everyone. As for the one who dreams of multiplying money and money together, this indicates The sleeper will reap the harvest of his toil in the previous period. But if the sleeper sees that the coins in his possession are rusty, this means that the sleeper may hear many bad or harmful words in the coming period. For those who dream of reducing coins significantly, the dream generally indicates a material loss. Usually, banknotes in a dream indicate a new beginning, such as a wife, son, or a new home, and in general, they indicate kindness and living. Money in a married woman's dream If a married woman sees her face engraved or drawn on money, she will live in joy, happiness, and food. If a married woman sees coins, this indicates that the woman has some need. If a married woman sees what is written on the coins, she will likely have something in the near future, such as a new house or car, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees banknotes in a dream, this means that she is a rich and pure woman. If a married woman finds banknotes on her way, she will soon meet a new friend. If a married woman sees silver coins, this indicates her daughters and gold coins for male children.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking without a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking without a hijab in a dream: If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about walking without a hijab in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very uncomfortable, but he wants to. Find out the interpretation for this reason. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars and not those of officials. . On the site there is no interference in interpretations, but rather it conveys the interpretations of both worlds. Interpretation of a dream about walking without a veil in a dream Walking without a veil in a dream may be a sign of getting rid of a problem that the dreamer may face at that time. If the girl sees that she is walking, but without a veil, it may be This is a sign that she is getting rid of the envy that she was exposed to in the past period. Walking without a head covering in a dream could be a sign that problems and sorrows will end in those days. If a person thinks that he was walking without a headscarf, this may be a sign of getting rid of sins. And the sins that he was committing, he must approach God, Blessed and Most High, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking on broken glass in a dream: A dream about walking on a glass may indicate that the dreamer suffered from a major problem during this period. In the event that someone saw that he was walking on glass, this may indicate the bad truth that the dreamer is suffering from in that Time. A dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that you discover a mistake made by someone during this time. A person’s dream of walking on broken glass may indicate that some people deceived him and manipulated him in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of walking on agricultural land in a dream is any Someone dreams that he is walking on agricultural land, it could be a sign of blessings and goodness that will come his way during that time. Walking on agricultural land in a dream could be a sign of the dreamer’s good behavior and morals. Whoever dreams that they walked on agricultural land, may indicate The abundance of sustenance and money that will come to them in the coming period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he is walking on agricultural land, this may be an indication of the positive changes that are occurring in your life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of walking on Zamzam water in a dream and if If one sees that he is walking on Zamzam water, this may indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations in the coming period, thanks to God. Walking on Zamzam water in a dream may be a sign of recovery from diseases that the dreamer suffered from in the previous period. If one sees that he is walking on water Zamzam, this may be a sign of the end of the worry and sorrow that the dreamer faced in his life at that time, thanks to God. If a person sees that he is walking on the water of Zamzam, this indicates the abundance of livelihood and broad satisfaction that the dreamer will gain at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of walking On my knees in a dreamIf a person sees that he is walking on his knees, this may indicate the distress that the dreamer is going through in those days. Walking on his knees in a dream may be a sign of a crisis that the dreamer is going through during this time. If one sees that he was walking on a knee

title: Interpretation of seeing a drawing and the meanings of dreaming about drawing in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a plan in a dream has many interpretations, which vary according to the social status of the dreamer, and in this article we will show you all possible interpretations about seeing a plan in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a drawing in a dream Seeing a plan in a dream indicates the psychological state of the dreamer and that he has great ambition and a pressing desire. In fulfilling his desires and desires and suggests that he lives in a state of calm and dreamy romance. Seeing a drawing in a dream indicates a change in the path of the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of drawing in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an unclear design in a dream, this indicates retreating from false assumptions and repenting for Sins. As for the dream that he draws on walls, paper, or other than clothes, this dream indicates comfort and that he will enjoy happiness in his life. As for the one who designs on clothes, this dream indicates illness and fatigue. Interpretation of seeing drawing for a single woman: An unmarried woman who dreams that she is planning, this dream indicates On her success and achieving her goals and that she is achieving success in the field of work and study. The dream may be evidence of finding a new job or traveling to a new place to work or study. Interpretation of seeing drawing in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams that she is planning, so this dream indicates the fulfillment of desires or success. In the field of work or study and can have good skin, fulfilling her desires and almost getting pregnant. Seeing the messenger in a married woman’s dream may mean that she will get rid of worries, problems and disagreements between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing a painting in a pregnant woman’s dream A pregnant woman sees herself in a dream, this dream promises her That God will bless her with a beautiful girl. The dream may be evidence that she will live a decent and happy life in the future with her daughter, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a drawing in a dream Who do you see in a dream? Someone is pulling you In the dream, this indicates that this person feels respect for you. It could be Drawing in a dream is a sign of planning a new project or for the future. If you see yourself drawing a picture of someone, it means that you have feelings for that person. Drawing in a dream can indicate an underlying inner strength that you want to express. Anyone who sees a drawing game in a dream It indicates that there are some important decisions about which he is hesitant to make a final decision. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a plan in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments at the bottom of the article via the Shamloul website and we will respond to you as quickly as possible .

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a red car according to Al-Usaimi and Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: A red car in a dream: A car is a means of transportation that cannot be overlooked, whether it is private property or a public means. If you see a red car in a dream, it can express a person’s status according to the luxury it appears to have, and it can carry other meanings according to the details of the dream, whether he is a passenger or A passenger or it may break while walking. What is the interpretation of seeing a red car in a dream? The interpretation of a dream about a red car differs from whether you are a driver or another person taking your place at the wheel, or things were good while riding or there were some pitfalls that may require it to break down and not arrive. on time. Details and many others can affect the course of interpretation of the vision, so let us explain it to you: If the girl sees that she is sitting holding the steering wheel and the color of the car is red and it looks luxurious, this means that she has arrived at the place she is looking for and that she is only controlling her path. life, and does not leave the matter in the hands of others to judge or express their opinion about what he does. If she is going through a new emotional experience and this person she loves is the leader, and things seem easy and the path is clear, then it is good for her that the wedding date is near and there are no obstacles, but on the On the contrary, everything is going as they planned. The companion who drives the dreamer's car is the one who orders and finishes his life, and the dreamer has no leadership role, but is always a helpless follower who does not dare to make any decisions about his personal life. His failure while walking indicates that there is Obstacles block his way towards the desired goal. Driving slowly means slowing down and not rushing, so there is no room for loss in the coming period and the dreamer must be optimistic about this dream and that good luck will accompany him in his future life. Interpretation of dreams about a red car by Ibn Sirin. The Imam of the Examiners said that the old means of transportation Or a modern car, such as a car in general, expresses the dreamer’s path, whether he is walking on the right path, which leads him to success and excellence, or he is heading in the wrong direction, which leads to incurring many losses in the future. He also said that seeing it could indicate the stability or severity of his affairs, and it all depends on what the dreamer sees in detail in his dream. A red car can express the feelings that the dreamer feels towards his life partner. If the two are in a car and the husband or fiancé is driving fast and the road is paved and clear, which helps him increase speed without danger, then this is good news for a speedy arrival and marriage that will take place in record time between the fiancé. Losing control of the steering wheel is the same thing it symbolizes in reality and that you will be forced To drive on a road that you do not like, and therefore the dream appears to be an unpleasant dream, and it is better for the dreamer to consider it an omen of the need to avoid mistakes so as not to fall into a dilemma that is difficult to get rid of. A car getting out of control is evidence of existing tensions in the relationship between the two partners and can lead to separation after widening. The gap between the two.Does the car look like it was recently purchased or is it an old brand and

title: The 25 most accurate interpretations of seeing a network in a dream

preview.html: The 25 most accurate interpretations of seeing a net in a dream, which expresses the influence and power that the dreamer can achieve in his life, and it can symbolize joy or soon marriage, and we will learn more about the details of the dreamer’s projection. Network in a dream through this article. What is the interpretation of seeing a network being lost in a dream? Proof of losing a job. Meaning of seeing a network being cut off in a dream? Evidence of the end of evil on its way to the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing you getting a gold bullion? Evidence of a lot of anxiety And stress and exposure to trouble. What does it mean to see single women communicating in a dream? It indicates that you hear good news. What is the interpretation of a man seeing in a dream that his net has been stolen? It indicates the loss of seats. Interpretation of seeing a net in a dream. Seeing the loss of a net in a dream is a sign of losing One of the centers. Losing a net in a dream can be a sign of insecurity with a life partner. Next, seeing a broken net in a dream is a sign of ending an evil that was on its way to the dreamer. A net in a dream is often a sign of cunning and deception. Interpretation of a vision The iron network in a dream: If a person sees that he is gaining a large size from the network, then this indicates goodness and broad nourishment. Then, seeing a gold alloy is a sign of many fears, anger, and problems. The network in the traveler’s dream if it is a clear indication that he will return and relieve him of his worries. If the net is only a ring, it shows the money that the dreamer will receive. After that, seeing an iron net, is evidence that there is a wide diet that will be on its way to the dreamer. The net in the dream indicates a halal profit. Seeing the net in a single woman’s dream if she sees For an unmarried girl to see the net in a dream, it means that she will hear happy news. Then to see the net in the girl’s dream means an engagement or acquaintance that ends in marriage and she is happy. If the girl sees the net falling to the ground and shattering, this indicates the end of the engagement. So seeing the net in The dream is evidence of having a lot of money. If a girl dreams that she is wearing silver netting, this is a sign of a new job that she will find soon. When an unmarried girl sees that she is buying a fishnet, this indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing wearing a fishnet in a dream for a married woman: If A married woman saw the network in a dream, this indicates pregnancy in the near future. Then seeing the network in the dream indicates the presence of a male child. Then breaking the network in the dream indicates divorce after problems with the husband. Interpretation of breaking a man’s network: A man sees his network stolen in a dream, This indicates the loss of positions. The net in a man’s dream is an indication of nourishment and kindness. When seeing the net inside the house, this is a sign of danger and you should be careful. If one sees himself in a dream because he is wearing a fishing net, this indicates that he will fit into a family that does not suit him.
